title: Radical Index
text: What is the index of the radical?

title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is 2, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to 0.

title: Solving the Radicand
text: Since the numerator is positive, to get $$\frac{4}{x+3}>0$$, we only need to ensure the denominator is positive. Solve $$x+3>0$$

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Solve $$x+3>0$$. Subtract 3 to both sides of the inequality.

title: Find the domain
text: We get $$x>-3$$ as the final answer. We can write $$x>3$$ in interval notation as $$(-3,\infty)$$.
